public ByteArrayDataSource(java.lang.String asciiData,
                           java.lang.String type)
Create a DataSource from a String

Parameters:
asciiData - data Assumption that the string contains only ASCII characters! Otherwise just pass a charset into this constructor and use it in getBytes()
type - MIME type e.g. text/html
